Class RootConfigurationProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.configuration.ConfigurationProperty

extends ConfigurationProperty
    Class that represents a root configuration property within kepler

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile()
        return the file that this configuration property represents

      • isDirty

        public boolean isDirty()
        returns true if any of the properties in this RootConfigurationProperty have been changed. This is the opposite functionality of ConfigurationProperty.isDirty() which is not recursive by default
        Overrides:
        isDirty in class ConfigurationProperty

        public ConfigurationProperty getRootProperty()
